title: Приворот
overview: Varya's life is like a fairy tale. She does what she loves, working as a pastry chef, and marries Ilya, with whom she dreams of spending her whole life. It seems that nothing and no one can ruin their happiness... But Alina, Varya's older sister, has other plans. Unlike her relative, Alina is unhappy in her marriage, although at first glance it is not noticeable. The envious and insidious woman is ready to do anything to get Varya's husband, even if it means resorting to black magic. However, Ilya's love spell turns into a real nightmare for both families.
